name: Fruit Fight!
description:
In this game you must rotate the two bats around the baseball diamond.  Rotate left by pressing the left arrow key and vice versa.  The goal of the game is to  get all of the fruit to the backboard no matter what it takes. You can hit the fruit with the bat, dodge the fruit, and even try to stay in one spot, however you will have to mix these actions in order to win. The points are displayed in the center of the baseball diamond and the music button is in the top right of the menu. 

Credits: Everything from art to programing was done by me Cowro48, however the music credits go to patrickdearteaga.com.

Thank you for playing Fruit Fight!
